IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To promote "Virtue and useful knowledge among the rising generations". For over 200 years, the Academy has pursued its mission through a classical education of the whole person. We prepare students to prosper academically in college and to enjoy an enduring commitment to the life of the mind. We teach the creative process of the arts emphasizing performace and exhibition. We promote athletic and physical development within an ethic of sportsmanship. We nurture strength of character, individual responsibility, and a commitment to the common good. Berwick students, teachers, and families comprise a community of learners that instills the ethic of personal excellence. The Academy is one school with three divisions each designed to broaden and deepen the foundations of virtue and knowledge for the continuing development of each student's potential.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To promote "Virtue and useful knowledge among the rising generations". For over 200 years, the Academy has pursued its mission through a classical education of the whole person. We prepare students to prosper academically in college and to enjoy an enduring commitment to the life of the mind. We teach the creative process of the arts emphasizing performace and exhibition. We promote athletic and physical development within an ethic of sportsmanship. We nurture strength of character, individual responsibility, and a commitment to the common good. Berwick students, teachers, and families comprise a community of learners that instills the ethic of personal excellence. The Academy is one school with three divisions each designed to broaden and deepen the foundations of virtue and knowledge for the continuing development of each student's potential.
IRS990.Description: Independent coeducational country day school, grades K-12, serving over 585 students from the Seacoast area of southern Maine and New Hampshire.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: The purpose of this fund is to generate income to be used to provide annual scholarships, awards and prizes to students of the Academy as well as to provide support for general operations of the Academy.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Effective July 1, 2009, the Academy adopted the provisions of Accounting for Uncertainty in Income Taxes as provided for in the Income Taxes topic of the FASB Accounting Standards Codification. This statement clarifies the criteria that an individual tax position must satisfy for some or all of the benefits of that position to be recognized in an entity's financial statements. It also prescribes a recognition threshold of more likely-than-not, and a measurement attribute for all tax positions taken or expected to be taken on a tax return, in order for those tax positions to be recognized in the financial statements. There was no cumulative effect on the Academy's financial statements related to adoption of these provisions, and no interest or penalties related to uncertain tax positions were accrued. The Academy is currently open to audit under the statute of limitations by the Internal Revenue Service and state taxing authorities for the years ended June 30, 2007 through 2010.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: THE SCHOOL'S RACIAL NONDISCRIMINATION POLICY IS PUBLISHED IN ITS CATALOGS AND BROCHURES.

Form990ScheduleIPartIII.DescriptionOfNonCashAssistance: Financial assistance to students in the form of tuition reduction.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: Housing is provided to the teaching staff and to the Head of School, on the business premises, for the convenience of the Academy, it is specified in the employment contract and pursuant to employment.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Business Manager prepares raw materials for independent accounting firm following the annual audit fieldwork. After preparation of the 990, the independent accounting firm provides a copy to the Business Manager. Business Manager then provides the Audit Committee with a draft copy of the 990 to review individually prior to vote. Audit Committee votes to approve form 990 as drafted on behalf of the Board of Trustees. The Audit Committee reports to both the Finance Committee and the Board of Trustees.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: New board members educated by committee on trustee through orientation process. Annually the board member disclosure and policy is reviewed and signed by each member at the first board meeting. Committee on trustees is made aware of any issues. Management monitors any disclosures and keep watch for any conflicts of interest. At this time, no conflict of interests have been self-identified nor identified by the committee on trustees or management.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The board of trustees has an ad hoc compensation committee which reviews and researches the Head of School compensation on an ongoing basis. The Head of School, and the Business Manager review and research management compensation. HOS/BM participate in a variety of benchmarking organization and review compensation on an ongoing basis.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Academy's form 990 is available online at Guidestar. Annual disclosures and financial statements are provided annually to the rating dissemination agent. Public inspection copies of the 990, the financial statements, disclosure statements and other governing documents are available in the Business Manager's office 8:00AM to 4:30PM Monday through Friday by appointment.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Annual disclosures and financial statements are provided annually to the rating dissemination agent. Public inspection copies of the 990, the financial statements, disclosure statements and other governing documents are available in the Business Manager's office 8:00AM to 4:30PM Monday through Friday by appointment.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part XI, Line 2C - Audit Process Oversight:

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: Support the activities of Berwick Academy
